Last modified: 2009-04-30.322: System logons should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.323: System logoffs should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.324: Password changes should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.325: su usage should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.326: Creation/modification of superuser groups should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.327: Startup/shutdown of audit functions should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.328: Certificate revocation should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.329: Remote access from outside the corporate network should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.330: Use of chown command should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.331: File permissions of the rcp binary should be set correctly
Last modified: 2009-04-30.332: File permissions of the rlogin binary should be set correctly
Last modified: 2009-04-30.333: File permissions of the rlogind binary should be set correctly
Last modified: 2009-04-30.334: File permissions of the rsh binary should be set correctly
Last modified: 2009-04-30.335: File permissions of the rshd binary should be set correctly
Last modified: 2009-04-30.336: File permissions of the tftp binary should be set correctly
Last modified: 2009-04-30.337: File permissions of the tftpd binary should be set correctly
Last modified: 2009-04-30.338: Global initialization files should allow or deny write access to the terminal as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.339: Netrc should be configured with an appropriate set of services
Last modified: 2009-04-30.340: Change of file ownership should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.341: Use of chmod command should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.342: Certificate creation should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.343: Certificate deletion should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.344: Certificate retrieval should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.345: Startup or shutdown of the audit process should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.346: Use of chgrp should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.347: Use of mkgroup should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.348: Use of rmgroup should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.349: Use of change user functions should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.350: Terminal logoffs should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.351: Exit function usage should be audited or not as appropriate
Last modified: 2009-04-30.352: Hard core dump size limits should be set appropriately
Last modified: 2009-04-30.353: Remote root logins via SSH should be allowed or not as appropriate.
